title: The Brimstone Chasm
description: Two years have passed since Tyler, Melissa and Lucy despatched Himmler to the contrap. Trained and better equipped, the trio is anxious for adventure and ready to tackle the remaining Nazi ghosts. The trouble is, Zebedee is acting strangely, the oppressor has gone AWOL and Silvia Bates wants them dead.With two settings on the ghost machine still a mystery and mounting pressure to rescue the missing children, Tyler delves into the contrapâ€™s eerie past. If she cannot master it, Tyler knows she'll be just one more victim of the device. She's playing with fire and there's none more dangerous than in the Brimstone Chasm.
author: B.J. Mears
